categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: In 4 ABY, former Emperor's Hand Lumiya confronted the Dark Jedi Flint in the one-time residence of the recently deceased Sith Lord Darth Vader for rites to Sith Mastery. Lumiya proved the stronger of the two and soundly defeated Flint, forcing the latter to become the first apprentice in her fledgling Sith Order.
